name: Trouble On Rails
description:
FIGHT A STRUGGLE IN A TRAIN IN TROUBLE

The skies were clear and there was nothing to go wrong. Our beloved train conductor was just driving the train when, out of nowhere, it suddenly stopped. After a big rumble, the train conductor became scrambled. He had been trained for all kinds of situations, but this time his mind just went blank!

How will he get out of this mess?

Join on his little adventure to fix the train and get back on the journey!

P.s. This game is only a prototype, so we would like you to give us feedback after playing the game by accessing this LINK
  • A single-player narrative puzzle game with a unique environment.
  • A set of cool challenges to overcome with patience and focus skills.
  • Inputs that are simple to use and understand.
Controls

The controls are easy to get used to. 

  • Just use the 'Z' key to interact with objects and NPCs in the top-down area of the game and, in the sidescroller area, to jump.
  • Use the ARROW keys to move around!
  • Whenever you need to reset a puzzle, simply press "X"!
  • In the last level, to go through doors, press the "UP" key.
The Studio

Trouble On Rails®  was developed by Explode Toad Studios for a college project- all the donations will be used for future projects!
